hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
curl -s http://ippauto/index.php/status/show.xml > show.xml type show.xml type show.xml | findstr status.free./status if ErrorLevel 1 Exit 1
IF NOT EXIST z: ( net use z: /DELETE net use z: \\10.59.0.87\Firmwares )

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!c:\cygwin\bin\bash --login -i
if curl -s http://ippauto/index.php/status/show.xml | grep -q status.busy./status; then exit 1 fi
ARTIFACTORY=https://artifactory/api/storage/ipp-release/com/ac/ipp/SFB/$BuildRelease DOWNLOAD=$(echo $ARTIFACTORY | sed 's|api/storage/||')
if [ "$LASTBL" = "None" ]; then LASTBL=`curl -ks -X GET $ARTIFACTORY | grep uri | cut -d'"' -f4 | grep -v https | cut -c 2- | sort -Vr | head -1` fi echo Find: $LASTBL
if [ "$BuildRelease" = "3.0.1" ]; then BoardsList="440HD 430HD 420HD 405HD" else BoardsList="450HD 445HD 440HD 430HD 420HD 405HD" fi
for BOARD in $BoardsList; do echo Searce $ARTIFACTORY/$LASTBL/$BOARD/UC${BOARD}_$LASTBL.img... if curl -ks -X GET $ARTIFACTORY/$LASTBL/$BOARD | grep -q $LASTBL.img\"; then echo -- Check if UC${BOARD}_$LASTBL.img exist in z: if [ ! -f z:/UC${BOARD}_$LASTBL.img ]; then echo ---- Download UC$BOARD_$LASTBL.img to z: curl -ks -X GET $DOWNLOAD/$LASTBL/$BOARD/UC${BOARD}_$LASTBL.img --output z:\UC${BOARD}_$LASTBL.img else echo ---- z:/UC$BOARD_$LASTBL.img already exist.. skip the download... fi else echo Not exist in Artifactory: $ARTIFACTORY/$LASTBL/$BOARD... fi done
if [ -f z:/UC${model}HD_$LASTBL.img ]; then echo tclsh AtaExec.tcl -configName ${ConfigName}${model}LyncConfig.tcl -suiteName ${ConfigName}${model}Lync_basic.suite -firmwareVersionMain UC${model}HD_${LASTBL}.img cd C:/IpPhoneAutomation/ModifeidIterations/ATA tclsh AtaExec.tcl -configName ${ConfigName}${model}LyncConfig.tcl -suiteName ${ConfigName}${model}Lync_basic.suite -firmwareVersionMain UC${model}HD_${LASTBL}.img fi
